string.text: Meet with a stranger
the wolf said that a girl came to the camp. Maybe she needs help. We must find her and find out who she is.
Find food

As expected, the girl does not have anything at all. We need to feed her. In general, the whole story is very muddy. Maybe it is sent by someone here or just a newcomer like me. I do not know, time will judge. Still, I think she's an ordinary beginner and she should be helped, just need to glance from time to time for her. It is necessary to find canned food.
Feed Alice
We must give Alisa food. I myself will find food, but she is so fragile and helpless. Hmm. Something I did not think about that.
Find Mathis
on the Basis of the received message on the PDA I need the Stalker is in the area of the Sawmill. Need to meet and talk to him.
Work on Sidorovich: Meet with Sidorovich
In the camp there is a merchant Sidorovich. I ought to go to him to ask about the work, maybe something will be thrown up.
Work on Sidorovich: Send Alice weapons

Local dealer Sidorovich gave out equipment for me and Alisa. It's a brand-new MP5 with a silencer and a couple dozens of patron to them. I think with this weapon it will be easy enough for us to take the military camp. Although. who knows.
Work for Sidorovich: Find Alice's weapons
Somewhere I fucked up the gun that Sidorovich gave out. We should find the same and give it to Alice.
Work for Sidorovich: Clearing the military checkpoint
Sidorovich asked to clean the military checkpoint in the South of Cordon. It's good that the weapon gave out, otherwise it would not have been pulled at all.
Work on Sidorovich: Back to Sidorovich
the checkpoint is cleaned, now you need to return to Sidorovich.
Help Alice: Find a Response
Alice needs a detector. I suggested that she search at least the simplest. Let the Response be, than nothing will happen at all. Maybe she can find artifacts with him.
Work for Sidorovich: Give Alice her share
Sidorovich will pay us well. You must give her her share.
Work for Sidorovich: Share Alisa
You need to give the share to Alice. It is urgent to find money and things to give her her share, otherwise it will not end well. Since we paid for joint work, I must share it with her.
Work for Sidorovich: Back for the award
the territory is seized, it is necessary to take back your reward.
Work for Sidorovich: Southern Farm
Sidorovich gave the assignment to seize the territory.
Work for Sidorovich: Refueling
Sidorovich gave the assignment to seize the territory.
Work for Sidorovich: Depot
Sidorovich gave the assignment to seize the territory.
Work for Sidorovich: Abandoned Farm
Sidorovich gave the assignment to seize the territory.
Work for Sidorovich: Development of territories
Sidorovich gave the assignment to capture the main points. He wants these points to be captured by stalkers.
Unexpected guest: Matis
Alice on the flash-drive in the general chat sent a message to a stalker Mathis. I know that his name is Lech and he is Alice's friend. He asked to get to him quickly and help him.
Find Mathis
Necessary to find and to meet with Mathis
to Bring the AKS-74U Mathis
Find the AKS-74U Mathis
Mathis was asked to find them a AKS-74U
to Destroy the detachment of the bandits
Mathis was asked to destroy a squad of bandits at the gas station
to Destroy a squad of dogs,
Mathis gave me my first combat mission. You need to check your shooting skill on dogs.
Destroy the boar squad
Mathis gave me second combat mission. You have to fight with a group of wild boars nearby.
to return to camp
the Job is done. Need to get back to camp.
to return to camp
Found the PDA Digger. Now it needs to show the Tick. I will not be unblocked.
PDA of a group of diggers
Tick instructed to find the missing PDA group of diggers in a Dark Hollow. Landmark - destroyed bridge to the North.
Meet with Shultz
you Need to show PDA Schulz. Tick said he understands.
Show PDA Tick
Schultz unlock my PDA diggers. Now you need to give it to the Mite and to tell about information that gave Schultz.
Find the Tick
Mathis referred me to a Tick. He goes somewhere in the camp.
search for documents
the PDA has been said that the documents under a bridge. Need to find these documents and bring them to the Tick.
back to the Tick
Documents found, you need to go back to camp and give the documents to the Tick.
Local disassembly: Strip the gas station
the mite asked to seize the gas station. At night, the band its attack the camp and therefore Dell for the stalkers is not a quiet place. We need to help stalkers.
Local showdown: Return for reward
the Ticket job is complete. We must return for the reward.
the Request of the Zulus
Zulu has asked me to find him three boxes for a PKM
Bar 100 X-ray: Barman
I received a message on the PDA from Barmen. He is known in the area for his bar and the sale of various weapons. I ought to go to him, and find out what's there and how.
Bar 100 X-ray: Goofy
Stalker Goofy wants to see me. I do not know who it is or what the researchers are. We must go and find out.
Bar 100 Roentgen: Valerian
Father Valerian wants to see me. I do not know what he wants, but I do not feel good about it.
Lies to Salvation: Spy

I need to get to the base of freedom and learn from them the information necessary for researchers. They are preparing to storm the base. Hmm. Lying for salvation or salvation in lies? After all, I can simply turn over to their leader of freedom, and I can do as the researchers want. We need to discuss with Alice.
Clans Zones: information gathering
There are many clans in the Zone. We should gather information about the clans and join some of them with Alice.
Work on the Barkeep: gather equipment
the supplier scattered the equipment for the Barman in all the army warehouses. the military is very fond of walking there, we must be more careful.
Work for Barmen: return the property
All equipment is in place, it is necessary to return it to the Barman.
Device for hacking
A special PDA designed for hacking and remote reading from a PDA that are nearby. To use, you need intelligence.
Enable
Lying for Salvation: Intelligence

Valerian needs information about the current state of Freedom. the names of important persons he will announce through a closed communication channel. It is necessary to distract them all and arrange an assault.
Lying for salvation: Czech
My first goal is Cech. It is necessary to secretly take information from him.
Lying for salvation: A miser
Now I need a miser. This is a local trader.
Lying for salvation: Yar
the mechanic of freedom lives in the Angara. It is worth to visit him, the assault is already close.
Lying for salvation: Sturm
To seize the base of 'Freedom'
Lying for salvation: Sturm
To seize the base of 'Freedom'
Acquaintance with 'Duty': Voronin
A certain Voronin asked to go to him after the assault. I know that their base is located at the Research Institute 'Agroprom'. It will be necessary to visit there.
Lies for Salvation: Return
the assault was successfully completed. Now we need to return to Valerian and discuss with him further plans.
Digger foray: Document search
Diggersky sortie: Back to Voronin

It is necessary to collect documents on the underground of the Agroprom in a group of diggers. With the documents you need to visit Voronin and get all the introductory notes to begin the reconnaissance operation to explore the dungeon.
Folder with documents

This folder contains information about stalker Strelok and a non-doctor. Very little can be understood from the text, because the pages are clearly not new. Somewhere there are scrapes, somewhere they are torn, but the general essence can be understood. Here are some of the excerpts:
 'Shooter, in the dungeons of the agro industry I have something left for you. '
 ' You can enter the dungeons through the western Entrance to the research institute. '
 ' the doctor is waiting for you, hurry.'
Attempt at writing
Attempt at writing
